SELECT count(*) FROM ( select prodno as prodno, OM_DESC as omDesc, prodnm as prodnm, sum(SQTY) as sqty from ( select case when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%키즈%' then 'PPD00005' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%바이탈%' then 'PPD00158' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%드롭스%' then 'PPD00212' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%위청장쾌%' then 'PPD00157' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%츄어블%' then 'PPD00004' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%은행%' then 'PPD00145' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%멀티%' then 'PPD00144' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%비타민C%' then 'PPD00142' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%B복합%' then 'PPD00143' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%플레인%' or b.OL_GOODSNM like '%플래인%' then 'PPD00001' else b.OL_GOODSNM end as PRODNO , OM_DESC, case when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%키즈%' then '데일리키즈' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%바이탈%' then '바이탈리티' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%드롭스%' then '디드롭스' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%위청장쾌%' then '위청장쾌' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%츄어블%' then '스탑츄어블' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%은행%' then '은행잎추출물' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%멀티%' then '멀티비타민' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%비타민C%' then '비타민C' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%B복합%' then 'B복합' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%플레인%' or b.OL_GOODSNM like '%플래인%' then '플레인모닝' else b.OL_GOODSNM end as PRODNM ,sum(b.OL_QTY*1) as SQTY from order_mast a inner join order_list b on a.OM_ORDNO=b.OL_ORDNO where 1=1 and DATE_FORMAT(a.OM_UPLOADDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN '2017-10-11'and '2017-10-11' and left(a.OM_ORDNO,2)!='S2' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%1병%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%2병%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%3병%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%4병%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%1통%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%2통%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%3통%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%4통%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%5통%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%6통%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%7통%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%8통%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%9통%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%10통%' group by DATE_FORMAT(a.OM_UPLOADDATE,'%Y-%m-%d'), OM_DESC,PRODNM union all
select case when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%키즈%' then 'PPD00005' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%바이탈%' then 'PPD00158' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%드롭스%' then 'PPD00212' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%위청장쾌%' then 'PPD00157' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%츄어블%' then 'PPD00004' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%은행%' then 'PPD00145' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%멀티%' then 'PPD00144' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%비타민C%' then 'PPD00142' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%B복합%' then 'PPD00143' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%플레인%' or b.OL_GOODSNM like '%플래인%' then 'PPD00001' else b.OL_GOODSNM end as PRODNO , OM_DESC, case when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%키즈%' then '데일리키즈' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%바이탈%' then '바이탈리티' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%드롭스%' then '디드롭스' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%위청장쾌%' then '위청장쾌' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%츄어블%' then '스탑츄어블' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%은행%' then '은행잎추출물' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%멀티%' then '멀티비타민' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%비타민C%' then '비타민C' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%B복합%' then 'B복합' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%플레인%' or b.OL_GOODSNM like '%플래인%' then '플레인모닝' else b.OL_GOODSNM end as PRODNM ,sum(b.OL_QTY*1) as SQTY from order_mast a inner join order_list b on a.OM_ORDNO=b.OL_ORDNO where 1=1 and DATE_FORMAT(a.OM_UPLOADDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN '2017-10-11'and '2017-10-11' and left(a.OM_ORDNO,2)!='S2' and b.OL_GOODSNM like '%1병%' group by DATE_FORMAT(a.OM_UPLOADDATE,'%Y-%m-%d'), OM_DESC,b.OL_GOODSNM union all

SElECT * FROM ( SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 as num, OL_ORDNO olOrdno, OL_SEQ olSeq, OL_GOODSCD olGoodscd, OL_GOODSNM olGoodsnm, OL_PRICE olPrice, OL_QTY olQty, OL_UNITNAME olUnitname, OL_GOODSMODEL olGoodsmodel, OL_GOODSSIZE olGoodssize, OL_GOODSCOLOR olGoodscolor, OL_DESC olDesc, OL_REGDATE olRegdate FROM order_list, (SELECT @rownum :=0) AS R WHERE 1=1 ) XX
LIMIT #{endPageNum}, 20

SElECT * FROM ( select uploadDate as uploadDate, prodno as prodno, OM_DESC as omDesc, prodnm as prodnm, sum(SQTY) as sqty from ( select DATE_FORMAT(a.OM_UPLOADDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') uploadDate, case when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%키즈%' then 'PPD00005' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%바이탈%' then 'PPD00158' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%드롭스%' then 'PPD00212' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%위청장쾌%' then 'PPD00157' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%츄어블%' then 'PPD00004' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%은행%' then 'PPD00145' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%멀티%' then 'PPD00144' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%비타민C%' then 'PPD00142' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%B복합%' then 'PPD00143' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%플레인%' or b.OL_GOODSNM like '%플래인%' then 'PPD00001' else b.OL_GOODSNM end as PRODNO , OM_DESC, case when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%키즈%' then '데일리키즈' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%바이탈%' then '바이탈리티' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%드롭스%' then '디드롭스' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%위청장쾌%' then '위청장쾌' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%츄어블%' then '스탑츄어블' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%은행%' then '은행잎추출물' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%멀티%' then '멀티비타민' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%비타민C%' then '비타민C' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%B복합%' then 'B복합' when b.OL_GOODSNM like '%플레인%' or b.OL_GOODSNM like '%플래인%' then '플레인모닝' else b.OL_GOODSNM end as PRODNM ,sum(b.OL_QTY*1) as SQTY from order_mast a inner join order_list b on a.OM_ORDNO=b.OL_ORDNO where 1=1 and DATE_FORMAT(a.OM_UPLOADDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{regDate} and #{regDate} and left(a.OM_ORDNO,2)!='S2' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%1병%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%2병%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%3병%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%4병%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%1통%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%2통%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%3통%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%4통%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%5통%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%6통%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%7통%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%8통%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%9통%' and b.OL_GOODSNM not like '%10통%' group by DATE_FORMAT(a.OM_UPLOADDATE,'%Y-%m-%d'), OM_DESC,PRODNM union all
